data.comment: The match has started at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
Gustavo Correia awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 3, In Barcelos a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Gil Vicente to take a throw-in in Guimaraes territory.
Gustavo Correia signals a Gil Vicente throw-in in Guimaraes's half.
In the minute 6, Guimaraes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Guimaraes.
Guimaraes's Ricardo Quaresma is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Guimaraes in the half of Gil Vicente.
Can Gil Vicente get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Guimaraes's half?
Gil Vicente's Antoine Leautey misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 13, Guimaraes have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Gil Vicente goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Guimaraes in Barcelos.
In the minute 16, Corner awarded to Guimaraes.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Gil Vicente awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 18, Ball safe as Gil Vicente is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Gil Vicente push forward at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos and Miullen gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Guimaraes defence.
Gil Vicente have been awarded a corner by Gustavo Correia.
In the minute 19, Free kick for Guimaraes in their own half.
Free kick for Guimaraes in the half of Gil Vicente.
Corner awarded to Guimaraes.
In the minute 22, Throw-in for Gil Vicente at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
Gustavo Correia signals a free kick to Guimaraes.
Bruno Duarte scores to make it 0-1 at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
In the minute 23, Ricardo Quaresma instrumental with a fine assist.
At Estadio Cidade de Barcelos, Guimaraes are penalized for being offside.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Gil Vicente close to the penalty box.
In the minute 27, Gil Vicente needs to be cautious. Guimaraes have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente in their own half.
Free kick for Gil Vicente in the half of Guimaraes.
In the minute 30, Important block from the Guimaraes defence as Joao Talocha fires in a strike for Gil Vicente.
Gil Vicente are caught offside.
Gustavo Correia signals a free kick to Guimaraes in their own half.
In the minute 32, Free kick for Guimaraes in their own half.
Ricardo Quaresma for Guimaraes gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Barcelos.
In the minute 36, Throw-in Gil Vicente.
Gustavo Correia awards Guimaraes a goal kick.
Gil Vicente to take a throw-in in Guimaraes territory.
In the minute 37, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Gil Vicente's Lourency gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Guimaraes defender.
Guimaraes will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Gil Vicente.
In the minute 41, In Barcelos, Lucas Mineiro of Gil Vicente is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Gil Vicente have been awarded a corner by Gustavo Correia.
Goal kick for Guimaraes at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
In the minute 45, Gil Vicente are pushing forward but Lucas Mineiro's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Barcelos.
Throw-in for Guimaraes at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Gustavo Correia has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Throw-in Guimaraes.
Throw-in for Guimaraes in their own half.
Gil Vicente make their first substitution with Samuel Dias Lino replacing Miullen.
Ball safe as Guimaraes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 49, Gil Vicente have been awarded a corner by Gustavo Correia.
Corner awarded to Gil Vicente.
Corner awarded to Gil Vicente.
In the minute 50, Nogueira (Gil Vicente) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Gil Vicente have been awarded a corner by Gustavo Correia.
Gil Vicente surge into the attack at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos but Lucas Mineiroâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 50, Guimaraes have a goal kick.
Gustavo Correia awards Gil Vicente a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Guimaraes goal kick.
Gustavo Correia signals a free kick to Gil Vicente.
In the minute 53, Bruno Varela (Guimaraes) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Gustavo Correia signals a Gil Vicente throw-in in Guimaraes's half.
In the minute 55, Gil Vicente's Lucas Mineiro breaks free at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Guimaraes at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
Can Gil Vicente get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Guimaraes's half?
In the minute 56, Samuel Dias Lino (Gil Vicente) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Guimaraes have a goal kick.
Gustavo Correia awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 57, Free kick Gil Vicente.
Can Gil Vicente capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Guimaraes's half?
Claude Goncalves (Gil Vicente) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 58, Guimaraes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente in the half of Guimaraes.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente close to the penalty box.
In the minute 60, Gil Vicente push forward at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos and Samuel Dias Lino gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Guimaraes defence.
Guimaraes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gil Vicente's Ruben Fernandes has been booked in Barcelos.
In the minute 62, Guimaraes pushes forward through Jacob Maddox, whose finish on goal is saved.
Guimaraes have been awarded a corner by Gustavo Correia.
Gustavo Correia signals a free kick to Gil Vicente in their own half.
In the minute 63, Rui Almeida is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos with Yves Baraye replacing Antoine Leautey.
Miguel Luis is replacing Andre Andre for the away team.
Free kick for Gil Vicente in their own half.
In the minute 64, Goal kick for Guimaraes at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
Throw-in for Guimaraes at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
Goal! Gil Vicente go level at 1-1 through Samuel Dias Lino in Barcelos.
In the minute 66, Yves Baraye with an assist there.
Guimaraes's Ricardo Quaresma gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Gil Vicente defender.
Gil Vicente awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 68, Gustavo Correia signals a free kick to Guimaraes in their own half.
In Barcelos a free kick has been awarded the away team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 71, Gil Vicente's Lucas Mineiro gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Guimaraes push upfield but Gustavo Correia quickly pulls them for offside.
In Barcelos Gil Vicente attack through Ruben Fernandes. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 74, Gustavo Correia awards Guimaraes a goal kick.
The away team replace Bruno Duarte with Noah Jean Holm.
Rochinha is replacing Jacob Maddox for Guimaraes at Estadio Cidade de Barcelos.
In the minute 75, Rui Almeida (Gil Vicente) is making a third substitution, with Renan Oliveira replacing Lourency.
Samuel Dias Lino (Gil Vicente) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Gil Vicente attack but Samuel Dias Lino's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 78, Ball goes out of play for a Guimaraes goal kick.
The away team have replaced Abdul Mumin with Marcus Edwards. This is the fourth substitution made today by Joao Henriques.
The away team have replaced Ricardo Quaresma with Andre Almeida. This is the fifth substitution made today by Joao Henriques.
In the minute 81, Corner awarded to Guimaraes.
Gustavo Correia signals a Guimaraes throw-in in Gil Vicente's half.
Guimaraes drives forward and Miguel Luis gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 82, In Barcelos a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Gil Vicente in the half of Guimaraes.
Miguel Luis (Guimaraes) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 84, Gil Vicente have been awarded a corner by Gustavo Correia.
Gil Vicente drive upfield and Samuel Dias Lino gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Guimaraes defender.
Can Gil Vicente get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Guimaraes's half?
Free kick for Gil Vicente in their own half.
Throw-in for Guimaraes in their own half.
In the minute 85, Joao Afonso is on a sub for Lucas Mineiro for Gil Vicente.
In the minute 86, Gustavo Correia signals a free kick to Guimaraes in their own half.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente in the half of Guimaraes.
Free kick Guimaraes.
In the minute 89, Important block from the Guimaraes defence as Yves Baraye fires in a strike for Gil Vicente.
Guimaraes take a 1-2 lead thanks to Rochinha.
That's a fine assist from Marcus Edwards.
At Estadio Cidade de Barcelos the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in Gil Vicente.
Gustavo Correia signals a throw-in for Gil Vicente, close to Guimaraes's area.
Corner awarded to Gil Vicente.
Nogueira's header is off-target for Gil Vicente.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Barcelos.
Guimaraes awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's 1-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
